title: 820-00134 fan not spinning
message: a customer tried to replace the thermal paste and mangled the pins on the cpu socket.  I know that on some of the 2015 apple laptops, the fan doesn't stay spinning all the time.  Do the fans on the 2015 imac spin continually or no?

title: 820-00134 fan not spinning
message:
Not sure.
Run a graphics stress test and see if starts...

title: 820-00134 fan not spinning
message: yeah fans are supposed to run upon starting the board

title: 820-00134 fan not spinning
message: is there a way to tell which temp sensor is malfunctioning on the 2015 imac?

title: 820-00134 fan not spinning
message: When an iMac is open, HDD and LCD temp sensors are the first suspects.

title: 820-00134 fan not spinning
message: the fan was bad and q5675/c5675 had been knocked off the board
